primary_diagnosis.justification: Clinical history confirms multiple past depressive episodes without intervening mania/hypomania. The recent initiation of *Sertraline* 4 weeks ago and ongoing symptomatic presentation aligns with a current depressive episode. Based on the severity assessment by the team, the episode is currently categorized as Moderate.
dsm_criteria_met: Recurrent criteria met (history of two or more episodes)
Criteria D (No history of manic or hypomanic episodes) confirmed
Criteria A-C (Symptoms, distress/impairment) inferred/met based on treatment-seeking behavior

ruled_out.reason: The Clinical Entity Agent confirms the patient explicitly denies any history of manic or hypomanic episodes, ruling out the Bipolar spectrum disorders.
The history provided suggests *Recurrent* Major Depressive Disorder, requiring the F33 category.
